translation: Fosuizhao Huiban Chushi Chanshi yulu, vol. 19, sounds and cuts stirrup (dabang cut), trough (dingke cut), flash (shisheg cut), important (lutang cut), [pāragiri + + cut] (piyan cut), laughter (hāta cut), passing (chujian cut), fortress (chai decisive cut), hem (jubian cut), elephant (yuling cut), falcon (xijin cut), mussel (yizhu cut), tongyong (dingda cut), earning (tujia cut), palletizing (tuguo cut), rolls (limu cut), and standing (yukic cut).
